AICV-Mobile
App Function Guide
Main Features

This application uses YOLOv8 object detection technology and an improved OC-SORT tracking algorithm (combined with Kalman filters) to identify and track various objects in real-time, supporting multiple visual styles and custom settings. Accelerated by the NCNN framework, it offers instance segmentation and efficient object tracking.
Default Config: Starts with YOLOv8n-seg segmentation model, detection and mask thresholds at 0.30, GPU as the running device, and Quantum Spectrum visual style.
Model Descriptions
• YOLOv8n: Lightweight, fastest, suitable for low-spec devices (COCO 80 classes).
• YOLOv8s: Small model, balanced speed and accuracy (COCO 80 classes).
• YOLOv8m: Medium model, higher accuracy (COCO 80 classes).
• YOLOv8n-seg: Lightweight segmentation model, fast mask generation.
• YOLOv8s-seg: Small segmentation model, balanced speed and mask quality.
• YOLOv8m-seg: Medium segmentation model, high-quality masks.
• YOLOv8n-oiv7: Lightweight extended model (OIV7 600+ classes).
• YOLOv8s-oiv7: Small extended model (OIV7 600+ classes).
• YOLOv8m-oiv7: Medium extended model (OIV7 600+ classes).
Operation Guide
1. Model Selection: Top dropdown (n: fast, m: accurate, seg: segmentation, oiv: more classes).
2. Running Mode: CPU (compatible) / GPU (fast).
3. Detection Style: 10 visual styles available; click info button for details.
4. Detection Threshold (0-1): Higher value is stricter (suggested: 0.25-0.65).
5. Mask Threshold (Seg models): Adjusts mask clarity (suggested: 0.25-0.5).
Function Buttons
• Camera Switch: Toggle front/rear camera.
• Class Filter: Select classes to detect (supports search).
• Tracking Settings: Adjust IoU Threshold (matching strictness), Max Age (frames to keep lost tracks), Min Hits (frames to confirm new track).
• Mask Tracking (Seg models): Use mask info to aid tracking, improving accuracy (can be disabled).
Tracking Mode Explanations
• Stable Mode: Suitable for fixed camera scenarios with slow-moving or static targets. Optimizes tracking stability and reduces ID switches.
• Handheld Mode: Optimized for camera movement, enables motion compensation, considers acceleration. Suitable for handheld shooting scenarios.
• Other Modes: The system might auto-adjust based on the scene or add more specific modes in the future.
Object Tracking Technology
Real-time multi-object tracking system using improved OC-SORT concepts with Kalman filters, combined with YOLOv8 for high accuracy and low latency.
• Multi-Object Tracking: Tracks multiple objects simultaneously, assigning unique IDs, handles occlusion and reappearance.
• Real-time Performance: Optimized algorithm, multi-threaded design, achieves 20-30 FPS on mid-range devices.
• Core Algorithm: Kalman filter for motion prediction, Hungarian/greedy algorithm for association, hit/miss counting for occlusion handling.
• Mask-Enhanced Tracking: Leverages pixel-level masks to improve tracking of irregular shapes and similar objects.
• Occlusion Handling: Advanced inference mechanism predicts occluded trajectories and recovers tracking.
• Use Cases: Pedestrian/vehicle tracking, sports analysis, security surveillance, adaptable to various environments.
Technical Specifications
• Detection Engine: NCNN-optimized YOLOv8
• Tracking Algorithm: Improved OC-SORT + Kalman Filter
• Datasets: COCO (80 classes), Open Images V7 (600+ classes)
• Requirements: Android 6.0+, OpenCL/Vulkan recommended
